***
### Locksmith Services Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) 

| **Property** | **Value** | **Description** | 
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3878620288-Doc3879354106 | Unique identifier for the solicitation. |
| Amendment Number | 3 | The current version of the solicitation. |
| Solicitation Number | WS3878620288 | The original solicitation number. |
| Publication Date | March 31, 2023 | The date the solicitation was made public. |
| Tender Closing Date | May 05, 2023 at 14:00:00 E.D.T | The deadline for submitting bids. |
| Amendment Date | May 2, 2023 | The date when the solicitation was last amended. |
| Expected Contract Start Date | April 1, 2023 | The anticipated start date of the contract. |
| Expected Contract End Date | April 1, 2026 | The anticipated end date of the contract. |
| Tender Status | Expired | The current status of the solicitation. |
| UNSPSC Code | 72101505 | The industry code indicating locksmith services. |
| Procurement Category | SRV | The category of goods or services being solicited. |

### Solicitation Details

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) seeks contractors capable of providing locksmith services, including:

- Supplying all resources, facilities, labor, equipment, materials, transportation, and supervision required to perform locksmith installations and maintenance of locking systems and their associated hardware.
- Cutting and/or manufacturing keys for various locking systems.
- Operating within all infrastructure within the Royal Canadian Airforce (RCAF) Edmonton area, specifically under RPOU(W) Sect Edm’s area of responsibility "as and when requested".

The majority of the work will be concentrated at CFB Edmonton, which includes both secure and operational zones. 

### Contact Information

- Contractor responsible for this solicitation: [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/).
- Contact person: Vinay Singh (SPAC/PSPC) at vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
